arabic.title: آه من لقاكِ
text: آه من لقاكى فى أول يوم
و اقول لعقلى يا عقلى يكنش متهيألى
و اقول لروحى يا روحى دى ناوية يطلع روحى
آه من لقاكى آه من لقاكى آه من لقاكى فى أول يوم.. آه
ده اللى يشوفوكى فى نص الليل
و اقول لقلبى يا حوستى دى طفشتلى عروستى
و اقول لرجلى يا رجلى دى ناوية تاخد أجلى
آه ياللى زى غراب البين آه
آه من لقاكى آه من لقاكى آه من لقاكى فى أول يوم.. آه
و اقول لعينى يا عينى فيه حاجة بينها و بينى
و أقول لبقى يا بقى خلاص يا داهية دقى
آه ياللى أسست و هديتى آه
آه ياللى عايزة تخربى بيتى آه
آه من لقاكى آه من لقاكى آه من لقاكى فى أول يوم.. آه

english.title: Aah, Meeting you!
text: Aah, meeting you from the first day!
And your walk on the wall
They made me keep on praying you'd "vanish from existence"
And I say to my mind: O my mind, could I be seeing unreal things?
My mind says to me: No!
And I say to my soul: O my soul, she intends to make my soul 2 flee 3!
My soul says to me: Yes.
Oh, you who  mixed up my innards/guts 4
Oh, you whose night is dark as mud
Aah, meeting you..   from the first day
They never wake up well in the morning
And I say to my heart: Oh my! She drove away my bride!
My heart says to me: Yes.
And I say to my leg: O my leg, she intends to bring my doom soon 6
My leg says to me: Yes.
Oh, you who separated  the happy couple
Oh, you who's like the harbinger of break up
Oh, you who turned the legs to jelly 4
Aah, meeting you..   from the first day!
Which I've never seen before in any devil
And I got tired of burning sulfur 7
And I say to my eye: O my eye, is there some enmity/hatred in her for me
My eye says to me: Yes.
And I say to my mouth: O my mouth, will it 8 keep clapping on9 like that!
My mouth says to me: Yes.
Aah, you who "I constructed & you destructed 10"
Aah, you who wants to bring my home down
Ah, you who came prancing in (bringing my doom)
Aah, meeting you..   from the first day!

arabic.title: صاحب السعادة
text: قول فضلت اجمع واحوش في الفلوس
كل ما امشي في أي حتة ابتسام
قلت أحسن لما أشوف بنت الحلال
قول نهايته رحت دافع مهر عال
يوم كتبنا ويوم دخلنا ع الزفاف
خياطتها والكمام طلعوا مش آخر موديل

english.title: Your Excellency
text: What is the meaning of happiness?
Tell me, tell me .... tell me, tell me
What is the meaning of happiness?
Tell me, tell me .... tell me, tell me
Some people told me once that for souls
So, I started collecting and saving money
Till I felt myself a Bey3
One with respect wipes my jacket,
Another one insults others for my sake,4
Another one makes a clown of himself5
Another leaves me a space to sit beside
That was all hypocrisy, all for the money
It wasn't neither of sincerity, nor of free will
There is a price for every laughter, for every smile
Tell me, Tell me ... tell me, tell me
What is the meaning of happiness?
Tell me, tell me .... tell me, tell me
I thought it better to look for my second half
Finally I paid a good dowry
For my bride, for the housewares
One day we registered the marriage, the other was the wedding day
A week later we were disappointed by the differences
While I was telling her about love, she was complaining about laundry,
About the tailor and how the sleeves look so old fashioned
All what bothers her is Sednawi6 and fashion
What is striped and what is plain
But her husband.. he doesn't matter that much
Tell me, Tell me ... tell me, tell me
Tell me, Tell me ... tell me, tell me
